caption:
The photograph captures a serene natural landscape featuring three deer on a grass-covered hill. These deer are standing with alert postures, perhaps cautious of their surroundings. The hill slopes gently upwards, dotted with green shrubs and small rocks, illustrating a typical grassland habitat.

In the background, the sky is overcast with heavy, gray clouds suggesting an impending storm or recent rainfall. This backdrop lends a somewhat dramatic mood to the scene.

Overall, the composition of the photograph, with its focus on wildlife and the natural environment under a stormy sky, evokes a sense of tranquility mixed with the rawness of nature. The cool, subdued color palette further enhances the peaceful yet moody atmosphere of the setting.
title: Antelope graze near the dave johnston power plant
